events.name: Challenges in the Sustainable Supply Chain of Electric Vehicle Batteries in India
events.wd_label: Challenges in the Sustainable Supply Chain of Electric Vehicle Batteries in India
events.wd_description: This event explores the challenges in the sustainable supply chain of electric vehicle batteries in India, focusing on operational, technological, economic, environmental, and social aspects, with the aim of helping policymakers develop strategies for sustainable transport systems.
events.description: This event explores the challenges in the sustainable supply chain of electric vehicle batteries in India, focusing on operational, technological, economic, environmental, and social aspects, with the aim of helping policymakers develop strategies for sustainable transport systems.

events.name: Challenges identification
events.wd_description: Identifying challenges for the sustainability of electric vehicle battery supply chains through literature review and discussions with industry experts in India.
events.description: Identifying challenges for the sustainability of electric vehicle battery supply chains through literature review and discussions with industry experts in India.

events.name: rational challenges
events.wd_description: Identifying operational challenges in the sustainable supply chain of electric vehicle batteries, such as ineffective recycling and reuse.
events.description: Identifying operational challenges in the sustainable supply chain of electric vehicle batteries, such as ineffective recycling and reuse.

events.name: hnological challenges
events.wd_description: Identifying technological challenges in the sustainable supply chain of electric vehicle batteries.
events.description: Identifying technological challenges in the sustainable supply chain of electric vehicle batteries.

events.name: nomic challenges
events.wd_description: Identifying economic challenges in the sustainable supply chain of electric vehicle batteries, such as high costs of disposal and recycling.
events.description: Identifying economic challenges in the sustainable supply chain of electric vehicle batteries, such as high costs of disposal and recycling.

events.name: ironmental challenges
events.wd_description: Identifying environmental challenges in the sustainable supply chain of electric vehicle batteries, including the impacts of disposal and recycling.
events.description: Identifying environmental challenges in the sustainable supply chain of electric vehicle batteries, including the impacts of disposal and recycling.

events.name: ial challenges
events.wd_description: Identifying social challenges in the sustainable supply chain of electric vehicle batteries.
events.description: Identifying social challenges in the sustainable supply chain of electric vehicle batteries.

events.name: Recycling and reuse
events.wd_description: Evaluating the challenges and opportunities for recycling and reusing electric vehicle batteries to enhance sustainability in India.
events.description: Evaluating the challenges and opportunities for recycling and reusing electric vehicle batteries to enhance sustainability in India.

events.name: ycling processes
events.wd_description: Assessing the current recycling processes for electric vehicle batteries, including primary and secondary recycling methods.
events.description: Assessing the current recycling processes for electric vehicle batteries, including primary and secondary recycling methods.

events.name: se opportunities
events.wd_description: Exploring opportunities for reusing electric vehicle batteries in other applications, such as grid storage.
events.description: Exploring opportunities for reusing electric vehicle batteries in other applications, such as grid storage.

events.name: Disposal and charging infrastructure
events.wd_description: Addressing the challenges related to the disposal of electric vehicle batteries and the insufficiency of charging infrastructure in India.
events.description: Addressing the challenges related to the disposal of electric vehicle batteries and the insufficiency of charging infrastructure in India.

events.name: posal challenges
events.wd_description: Analyzing the environmental and health impacts of battery disposal and the challenges associated with safe disposal methods.
events.description: Analyzing the environmental and health impacts of battery disposal and the challenges associated with safe disposal methods.

events.name: rging infrastructure
events.wd_description: Evaluating the current state and challenges of charging infrastructure for electric vehicles in India.
events.description: Evaluating the current state and challenges of charging infrastructure for electric vehicles in India.

events.name: Policy implications
events.wd_description: Providing insights for policymakers to develop strategies for sustainable transport systems based on the identified challenges and solutions for the EV battery supply chain.
events.description: Providing insights for policymakers to develop strategies for sustainable transport systems based on the identified challenges and solutions for the EV battery supply chain.

events.name: icy recommendations
events.wd_description: Developing policy recommendations to address the challenges in the sustainable supply chain of electric vehicle batteries.
events.description: Developing policy recommendations to address the challenges in the sustainable supply chain of electric vehicle batteries.

events.name: ategy development
events.wd_description: Formulating strategies for sustainable transport systems in developing countries based on the study's findings.
events.description: Formulating strategies for sustainable transport systems in developing countries based on the study's findings.
